name: VIN
notes: Vehicle Identification Number; known to work on JL/JT BCM via UDS ReadDataByIdentifier.

name: ECU Part Number
notes: Jeep part number string; reported by multiple modules (BCM, IPCM, radio, etc.).

name: Software Version
notes: Example software version string; confirm per ECU/model.

name: ECU Serial
notes: Serial number / unique ID; usage depends on module.

name: ECU Hardware Number
notes: Hardware part number; generic UDS-style identifier, may not be implemented on all ECUs.

name: Steering Wheel Temperature Raw
notes: BCM DID; first byte gives steering wheel temperature. Celsius ~= (value / 2) - 40 on vehicles with heated wheel.
